description: Wordplay connecting steak cooking levels and pun quality.
title: Steak Wit
n_1: Chef presents a steak to a curious customer at a fancy restaurant.
c1_1: Notice the perfection of this steak?
c2_1: Looks tempting, but why mention it?
n_2: Customer examines the steak, intrigued by the chef's pride.
c1_2: It's not just cooked; it’s an art form!
n_3: Chef grins, holding the steak up like a prized trophy.
c1_3: Cooking this steak is like crafting a good joke.
n_4: They both laugh as the chef delivers the punchline.
c1_4: Because a steak pun is a rare medium well done!
